# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_library(yql-yt-native)


target_compile_options(yql-yt-native PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_link_libraries(yql-yt-native PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  contrib-libs-protobuf
  library-cpp-resource
  library-cpp-yson
  cpp-yson-node
  cpp-mapreduce-client
  cpp-mapreduce-common
  yt-yt-client
  yt-library-program
  library-yql-ast
  yql-sql-pg
  yql-parser-pg_wrapper
  yql-core-facade
  yql-core-file_storage
  core-file_storage-proto
  core-file_storage-http_download
  yql-core-progress_merger
  core-services-mounts
  yql-core-user_data
  library-yql-minikql
  minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm14
  minikql-comp_nodes-llvm14
  library-yql-protos
  udf-service-exception_policy
  yql-utils-backtrace
  yql-utils-log
  utils-log-proto
  providers-common-proto
  providers-common-codec
  providers-common-udf_resolve
  providers-solomon-gateway
  providers-solomon-provider
  library-yql-core
  yql-core-url_preprocessing
  yql-dq-comp_nodes
  dq-actors-yt
  providers-dq-global_worker_manager
  providers-dq-provider

  providers-yt-codec

  yt-lib-log
  yt-lib-res_pull
  yt-lib-row_spec
  yt-lib-schema
  yt-lib-skiff
  yt-lib-yt_download
  providers-yt-provider
  yt-comp_nodes-dq
  yt-comp_nodes-llvm14
  providers-yt-dq_task_preprocessor
  library-yql-yt
  system_allocator
)

target_sources(yql-yt-native PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/yt/native/error_helpers.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/yt/native/progress_merger.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/yt/native/dq_manager.cpp
)


add_global_library_for(yql-yt-native.global
  yql-yt-native)


target_compile_options(yql-yt-native.global PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_link_libraries(yql-yt-native.global PUBLIC
